parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_SPIM_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_spim_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified SPIM interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if interrupts associated with the event mask are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the SPIM interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified SPIM events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK();
Pointer to the structure containing buffers associated with the last transaction. Can be NULL.

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the SPIM transaction buffers.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffers.

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the SPIM transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffers if the transaction is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking transactions.

briefdescription.para: Function for aborting the ongoing SPIM transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffers if the abort is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking operation.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the SPIM pins configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with SPIM pins configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the configuration of the SPIM pins used for extended features.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with SPIM pins configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling or disabling the TX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if TX list feature is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling or disabling the RX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if RX list feature is to be enabled, false otherwise.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_task_trigger Function for activating the specified SPIM task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_task_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified SPIM task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified task register.
nrf_spim_event_clear Function for clearing the specified SPIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be cleared.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the SPIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_event_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified SPIM event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified event register.
nrf_spim_shorts_enable Function for enabling the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be enabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_shorts_disable Function for disabling the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_shorts_get Function for getting the shortcut setting.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Current shortcut configuration.
nrf_spim_int_enable Function for enabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_spim_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_int_disable Function for disabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_spim_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_spim_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_spim_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given SPIM task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given SPIM task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given SPIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given SPIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_disable Function for disabling the SPIM peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_SPIM_Type *p_reg, uint32_t sck_pin, uint32_t mosi_pin, uint32_t miso_pin)
memberdef.name: nrfy_spim_pins_set

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_pins_set Function for configuring SPIM pins.

detaileddescription.para: If a given signal is not needed, pass the NRF_SPIM_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SCK pin number.
MOSI pin number.
MISO pin number.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_sck_pin_get Function for getting the SCK pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: SCK pin selection.
nrf_spim_mosi_pin_get Function for getting the MOSI pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: MOSI pin selection.
nrf_spim_miso_pin_get Function for getting the MISO pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: MISO pin selection.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_SPIM_Type *p_reg, uint32_t pin, nrf_spim_csn_pol_t polarity, uint32_t duration)
memberdef.name: nrfy_spim_csn_configure

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_csn_configure Function for configuring the SPIM hardware CSN pin.

detaileddescription.para: If this signal is not needed, pass the NRF_SPIM_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
CSN pin number.
CSN pin polarity.

Minimum duration between the edge of CSN and the edge of SCK and minimum duration of CSN must stay unselected between transactions. The value is specified in number of 64 MHz clock cycles (15.625 ns).

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_csn_pin_get Function for getting the CSN pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: CSN pin selection.
nrf_spim_dcx_pin_set Function for configuring the SPIM DCX pin.

detaileddescription.para: If this signal is not needed, pass the NRF_SPIM_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
DCX pin number.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_dcx_pin_get Function for getting the DCX pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: DCX pin selection.
nrf_spim_dcx_cnt_set Function for configuring the number of command bytes.

detaileddescription.para: Maximum value available for dividing the transmitted bytes into command bytes and data bytes is NRF_SPIM_DCX_CNT_ALL_CMD - 1. The NRF_SPIM_DCX_CNT_ALL_CMD value passed as the count parameter causes all transmitted bytes to be marked as command bytes.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Number of command bytes preceding the data bytes.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_iftiming_set Function for configuring the extended SPIM interface.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Sample delay for input serial data on MISO, specified in 64 MHz clock cycles (15.625 ns) from the sampling edge of SCK.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_stallstat_rx_clear Function for clearing stall status for RX EasyDMA RAM accesses.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_stallstat_rx_get Function for getting stall status for RX EasyDMA RAM accesses.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Stall status of RX EasyDMA RAM accesses.
nrf_spim_stallstat_tx_clear Function for clearing stall status for TX EasyDMA RAM accesses.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Stall status of TX EasyDMA RAM accesses.
nrf_spim_frequency_set Function for setting the SPI master data rate.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SPI frequency.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_prescaler_set Function for setting the prescaler value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Prescaler value.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_prescaler_get Function for getting the prescaler value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Prescaler value.
nrf_spim_tx_buffer_set Function for setting the transmit buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the buffer with data to send.
Maximum number of data bytes to transmit.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_tx_amount_get Function for getting number of bytes transmitted in the last transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
of bytes transmitted.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_tx_maxcnt_get Function for getting number of bytes to be transmitted in the next transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
of bytes to be transmitted.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_rx_buffer_set Function for setting the receive buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the buffer for received data.
Maximum number of data bytes to receive.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_tx_amount_get Function for getting number of bytes transmitted in the last transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
of bytes transmitted.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_rx_maxcnt_get Function for getting number of bytes to be received in the next transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
of bytes to be received.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_configure Function for setting the SPI configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SPI mode.
SPI bit order.

simplesect.para: nrf_spim_orc_set Function for setting the over-read character.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Over-read character that is clocked out in case of an over-read of the TXD buffer.

simplesect.para: NRF_SPIM_HAS_HW_CSN Macro for checking if the hardware chip select function is available.
NRF_SPIM_HAS_DCX Macro for checking if the DCX pin control is available.
NRF_SPIM_HAS_RXDELAY Macro for checking if the RXDELAY function is available.
NRF_SPIM_HAS_STALLSTAT Macro for checking if the STALLSTAT feature is available.
NRF_SPIM_HAS_EXTENDED Symbol indicating whether any of the SPIM extended features is available.
NRF_SPIM_HAS_ARRAY_LIST Symbol indicating whether EasyDMA array list feature is present.
NRF_SPIM_HAS_FREQUENCY Symbol indicating whether frequency is used.
NRF_SPIM_HAS_PRESCALER Symbol indicating whether prescaler is used.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the SPIM peripheral.
